original_title: Paris By Night 82: Tiếu Vương Hội
overview: Paris By Night 82: Tiếu Vương Hội is a Paris By Night program that was filmed at Studio 40 of the Canadian Broadcasting Centre in Toronto, Ontario - Canada on Saturday, March 25, 2006. It is one of Thúy Nga's "private" shows, as in, limited seats are available, and some are only invited guests only.
title: Paris By Night 82: Tiếu Vương Hội
